page.title: 13A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content: I get up at seven a.m. on a Monday morning. I go down to the bathroom and clean my teeth, go to the breakfast table and eat cereal, boiled egg and toast and then get dressed. I get my dinner money and walk to school. I sometimes go to the shop to get some sweets. When school stops Mrs Burns, our teacher, takes the register. During school time we do games, art, maths, English, religious education, geography and history. When I come back from school I have tea, then I watch television especially the tennis at Wimbledon. Later on at 6 o'clock I have dinner. At about 9-30 p.m. I go to bed.
